title.narrative: Promotion of transparency and accountability in the management of natural resources and infrastructure in Katanga, DRC.

description.narrative:
Overall Objective: Improving governance and performance in the management of natural resources and infrastructure in Katanga, DRC.
Specific objectives: Disseminating the mining code for operators and infrastructure standards to civil society, political, administrative and traditional authorities; establishing and/or strengthening the frameworks for dialogue between stakeholders in mining sites; evaluating the infrastructure built and/or rehabilitated by mining companies and/or government through revenue generated by the exploitation of mineral resources, and resolve identified problems.;
